# This file is autogenerated
title: experimental_createMultiSig
description: Overview of the experimental_createMultiSig method
slug: wallets/reference/account-kit/signer/classes/BaseSignerClient/experimental_createMultiSig
---

This will create a multi-sig with the current user and additional specified signers

## Import

```ts
import { BaseSignerClient } from "@account-kit/signer";
```

## Parameters

### quorum

`number`
multi sig quorum, currently only 1 is supported

### additionalMembers

`Address[]`
members to add, aside from the currently authenticated user

## Returns

`Promise<SignerResponse<"/v1/multi-sig-create">>`
created multi-sig
